methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructor for a provider that can display a ListingCodeComparisonPanel.

params.name: tool
params.comment: the tool that contains this provider.

params.name: name
params.comment: the owner of this provider, which is usually a plugin name.

params.name: p1
params.comment: program for the listing displayed in the left side of the panel.

params.name: p2
params.comment: program for the listing displayed in the right side of the panel.

params.name: set1
params.comment:
the address set indicating the portion of the listing displayed in the left side 
 of the panel.

params.name: set2
params.comment:
the address set indicating the portion of the listing displayed in the right side 
 of the panel.
